price: Once he checked the birds, and said, “Why is it that I do not see the hoopoe – or is he among the absent?
arabic: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيۡرَ فَقَالَ مَالِيَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلۡهُدۡهُدَ أَمۡ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَآئِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
